DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine discordant hormonal status of primary breast tumor and metastatic breast cancer cells at regional lymph nodes in node positive breast cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Discordant Hormonal Status of Breast Cancer.
DOC.detailed_description: Hormonal status between primary breast tumor and axillary lymph node were analyzed.
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer patients stage I,II and III with axillary lymph nodes metastasis. Breast cancer patients stage I,II and III without axillary lymph nodes metastasis.
